Name: Marseillaise
Propulsion:
2-shaft Parsons single reduction geared turbines
4 Indret boilers
84,000 shp (63,000 kW)
Range:
7,000 nmi (13,000 km; 8,100 mi) at 12 knots (22 km/h; 14 mph)
6,800 at 14 knots
5,500 at 18 knots
1,650 at 34 knots
Armament:
9 × 155 mm (6.1 in)/55 guns (3 × 3)
8 × 90 mm (3.5 inch) anti-aircraft (4 × 2)
24 × 40 mm (1.6 in) (6 × 4)
4 × 550mm (21.7 inch) torpedo tubes (2 × 2)
Armour:
Main belt: 105 mm (4.1 in)
End bulkheads: 30 mm (1.2 in)
Sides: 120 mm (4.7 in)
Deck: 38 mm (1.5 in)
Turrets: 100 mm (3.9 in)
Conning tower: 95 mm (3.7 in)
Aircraft carried:
up to 4 GL-832, later 2 Loire 130 flying boats
1 catapult
